quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: You canâ€™t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.

quotes.author: Thomas Edison
quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey
quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

quotes.author: Michael Jordan
quotes.quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.

quotes.author: Stephen Hawking
quotes.quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quotes.author: Les Brown
quotes.quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss it you will land among the stars.
